tasks.title: Implement document upload component

tasks.title: Implement real-time dashboard component

tasks.details: Create components/dashboard.py with NATS topic monitoring, real-time message flow visualization, topic status indicators (grey for idle, green for active), plotly charts for message rates, and WebSocket connection for live updates of system metrics.

subtasks.title: Set up NATS monitoring connection

subtasks.title: Implement real-time data fetching
subtasks.description: Create data fetching mechanisms for live NATS topic metrics and system status
subtasks.details: Implement async functions to fetch topic statistics, message counts, consumer lag, and system metrics. Create data models for metric storage and implement periodic data collection with configurable intervals.

subtasks.title: Create topic status indicators

subtasks.details: Implement status indicator components with grey for idle topics, green for active topics, and red for error states. Create status calculation logic based on message activity thresholds and last message timestamps.

subtasks.title: Build Plotly visualization charts
subtasks.description: Create interactive Plotly charts for message rates, topic activity, and system metrics
subtasks.details: Implement Plotly charts for message rate over time, topic throughput comparison, consumer lag visualization, and system performance metrics. Include interactive features like zoom, hover tooltips, and time range selection.

subtasks.title: Implement WebSocket live updates
subtasks.description: Create WebSocket connection for real-time dashboard updates and live data streaming
subtasks.details: Implement WebSocket client for receiving live metric updates, create update handlers for chart refreshing, status indicator updates, and implement automatic reconnection with exponential backoff. Include error handling for connection failures.

tasks.title: Create Milvus collection schema and index configuration
tasks.description: Set up Milvus collection schema for medical documents with proper indexing
tasks.details: Create initialization script for medical_documents collection with schema (chunk_id, embedding, text_content, document_title, source_url, page_number, diseases, processed_at, job_id), COSINE similarity index configuration (IVF_FLAT with nlist=128), and collection optimization settings.
tasks.testStrategy: Integration tests for schema creation, index performance, and data insertion validation

subtasks.title: Design collection schema and field definitions
subtasks.description: Define the complete Milvus collection schema with all required fields, data types, and field properties
subtasks.details: Create schema definition with chunk_id (primary key, VarChar), embedding (FloatVector, dim=768), text_content (VarChar), document_title (VarChar), source_url (VarChar), page_number (Int64), diseases (VarChar), processed_at (VarChar), and job_id (VarChar). Include field constraints, nullable settings, and auto-generated ID configuration.

subtasks.title: Implement collection creation script
subtasks.description: Create the initialization script to create the medical_documents collection with the defined schema
subtasks.details: Develop create_collection.py script with Milvus connection setup, collection creation logic using the schema from 19.1, error handling for existing collections, and collection existence verification. Include proper logging and connection cleanup.

subtasks.title: Configure vector index with IVF_FLAT and COSINE similarity
subtasks.description: Set up the vector index configuration for optimal similarity search performance
subtasks.details: Implement index creation with IVF_FLAT index type, COSINE metric type, nlist=128 parameter for optimal performance on medical document embeddings. Include index building process, performance validation, and index status monitoring.

subtasks.title: Apply collection optimization and performance settings
subtasks.description: Configure collection-level optimization settings for production performance
subtasks.details: Set up collection optimization parameters including segment configuration, compaction settings, memory management, and query performance tuning. Configure collection loading strategy, resource allocation limits, and monitoring for sub-100ms query performance requirements.

tasks.title: Set up NATS topics and JetStream configuration
tasks.description: Configure NATS JetStream topics and KV stores for ephemeral messaging architecture
tasks.details: Create NATS configuration script to set up JetStream topics (questions, documents.download, embeddings.create, answers.*, system.metrics), KV store for sessions with TTL, consumer configurations, and retention policies for ephemeral processing.
tasks.testStrategy: Integration tests for topic creation, KV store operations, TTL behavior, and consumer setup

subtasks.title: Create JetStream topic configuration
subtasks.description: Set up JetStream topics for questions, documents.download, embeddings.create, answers.*, and system.metrics
subtasks.details: Create NATS configuration script to establish JetStream topics with appropriate subject patterns. Configure topics for questions processing, document download requests, embedding creation tasks, session-specific answer delivery (answers.*), and system metrics collection. Include proper stream configuration with retention policies.

subtasks.title: Configure KV store for session management
subtasks.description: Set up NATS KV store for session data with TTL configuration
subtasks.details: Create KV bucket for session management with automatic TTL expiration. Configure bucket policies, access controls, and session data schema. Implement TTL-based cleanup for ephemeral session storage ensuring data expires according to architecture requirements.

subtasks.title: Set up consumer configurations
subtasks.description: Configure JetStream consumers for each topic with appropriate delivery policies
subtasks.details: Create consumer configurations for each JetStream topic including delivery policies, acknowledgment settings, retry policies, and consumer groups. Configure durable consumers for reliable message processing and appropriate consumer naming conventions for service identification.

subtasks.title: Implement retention and TTL policies
subtasks.description: Configure stream retention policies and TTL settings for ephemeral messaging
subtasks.details: Set up retention policies for all streams to ensure ephemeral behavior with 1-hour default TTL. Configure memory-based storage, message limits, and automatic purging policies. Implement monitoring for retention policy effectiveness and resource usage optimization.

tasks.title: Create Docker services configuration
tasks.description: Create docker-compose.services.yml for application services deployment
tasks.details: Create docker-compose.services.yml with service definitions for worker, api, and ui services, environment variable configuration, dependency management, health checks, resource limits, and integration with existing infrastructure services.
tasks.testStrategy: Integration tests for Docker deployment, service health checks, and container orchestration

subtasks.title: Define service configurations for worker, api, and ui
subtasks.description: Create service definitions in docker-compose.services.yml with proper build contexts, ports, volumes, and networking configuration
subtasks.details: Define three services (worker, api, ui) with appropriate build contexts pointing to services/ subdirectories, expose necessary ports (8000 for API, 8501 for UI), configure shared volumes for logs and temporary files, and set up inter-service networking. Include resource limits and restart policies.

subtasks.title: Configure environment variables and secrets management
subtasks.description: Set up environment variable configuration for all services with proper secret handling and infrastructure integration
subtasks.details: Configure environment variables for GOOGLE_API_KEY, NATS_URL, MILVUS_HOST/PORT, set up .env file integration, configure service-specific environment sections, and ensure proper propagation of infrastructure connection settings from base docker-compose.yml to application services.

subtasks.title: Implement health checks and dependency management
subtasks.description: Add health check configurations and service dependency orchestration to ensure proper startup order
subtasks.details: Configure health checks for each service (HTTP endpoints for API/UI, process checks for worker), set up depends_on relationships to ensure infrastructure services (NATS, Milvus) start before application services, implement proper wait conditions and retry logic, and add service discovery configuration.

tasks.title: Implement comprehensive error handling and logging
tasks.description: Add structured logging and error handling across all services
tasks.details: Implement structured logging with proper log levels, error handling middleware for FastAPI, exception handling in worker processes, graceful degradation strategies, and centralized error reporting. Include proper cleanup for failed operations.
tasks.testStrategy: Unit tests for error scenarios, logging output validation, and graceful failure handling

subtasks.title: Set up structured logging framework
subtasks.description: Configure centralized logging with proper formatters, handlers, and log levels across all services
subtasks.details: Create shared/logging.py with structured JSON logging configuration, log formatters with timestamps and service identification, file and console handlers, configurable log levels (DEBUG, INFO, WARNING, ERROR, CRITICAL), and integration with existing configuration management from task 5.

subtasks.title: Implement FastAPI error handling middleware
subtasks.description: Create comprehensive error handling middleware for the API service with proper HTTP status codes
subtasks.details: Add error middleware to services/api/main.py that catches all exceptions, logs errors with structured format, returns appropriate HTTP status codes and error responses, handles validation errors, authentication errors, and internal server errors with proper JSON responses.

subtasks.title: Add exception handling to worker processes
subtasks.description: Implement robust exception handling in all worker handlers with proper cleanup and retry logic
subtasks.details: Update handlers in services/worker/ (documents.py, embeddings.py, answers.py) to include try-catch blocks, structured error logging, graceful handling of API failures, NATS connection errors, Milvus errors, and proper cleanup of partial operations with exponential backoff for retries.

subtasks.title: Implement graceful degradation strategies
subtasks.description: Add fallback mechanisms and graceful degradation when services are unavailable
subtasks.details: Implement circuit breaker patterns for external API calls, fallback responses when Milvus is unavailable, graceful handling of NATS disconnections, timeout configurations for all external dependencies, and user-friendly error messages in the UI when services are degraded.

subtasks.title: Create centralized error reporting and monitoring
subtasks.description: Set up centralized error collection and basic monitoring for system health
subtasks.details: Create shared/monitoring.py with error aggregation, health check endpoints for all services, error rate tracking, system metrics collection (memory, CPU, connection counts), and integration with the Streamlit dashboard to display system health and error statistics in real-time.

tasks.title: Create unit tests for shared utilities
tasks.description: Implement comprehensive unit test suite for shared utilities and core functions
tasks.details: Create unit tests for database.py (Milvus operations), messaging.py (NATS operations), models.py (Pydantic validation), config.py (environment loading), and websocket_manager.py (connection handling). Use pytest with proper mocking for external dependencies.
tasks.testStrategy: Test coverage analysis and CI/CD integration for automated testing

subtasks.title: Create database utilities unit tests
subtasks.description: Implement comprehensive unit tests for database.py covering Milvus operations
subtasks.details: Create test_database.py with tests for Milvus connection, collection operations, vector insertions/queries, schema validation, and error handling. Mock pymilvus dependencies and test connection failures, invalid schemas, and query edge cases.

subtasks.title: Create messaging utilities unit tests
subtasks.description: Implement comprehensive unit tests for messaging.py covering NATS operations
subtasks.details: Create test_messaging.py with tests for NATS connection, JetStream operations, topic publishing/subscribing, KV store operations, and TTL behavior. Mock nats-py dependencies and test connection failures, message delivery, and stream configurations.

subtasks.title: Create model validation unit tests
subtasks.description: Implement comprehensive unit tests for models.py covering Pydantic validation
subtasks.details: Create test_models.py with tests for all Pydantic models including SessionCreate, QuestionRequest, DocumentRequest, AnswerResponse, and validation logic. Test field validation, serialization/deserialization, and edge cases for invalid data.

subtasks.title: Create configuration management unit tests
subtasks.description: Implement comprehensive unit tests for config.py covering environment loading
subtasks.details: Create test_config.py with tests for environment variable loading, default values, configuration validation, and error handling for missing required variables. Mock os.environ and test various configuration scenarios and validation failures.

subtasks.title: Create WebSocket manager unit tests
subtasks.description: Implement comprehensive unit tests for websocket_manager.py covering connection handling
subtasks.details: Create test_websocket_manager.py with tests for WebSocket connection lifecycle, session-based routing, message broadcasting, connection pooling, and error handling. Mock WebSocket connections and NATS integration, test connection failures and message delivery scenarios.

tasks.title: Create integration tests for end-to-end workflows

tasks.details: Create integration tests for full document indexing workflow (URL submission to vector storage), complete Q&A workflow (question to real-time answer), WebSocket integration testing, and multi-service interaction validation. Include performance benchmarks and load testing scenarios.

subtasks.title: Set up integration test environment

subtasks.details: Create docker-compose.test.yml with test-specific configurations, environment variables for testing, test data volumes, and service isolation. Include test database initialization, NATS test streams setup, and Milvus test collections.

subtasks.title: Implement document processing workflow tests
subtasks.description: Create integration tests for complete document indexing pipeline from URL to vector storage
subtasks.details: Test full workflow: PDF URL submission  download  chunking  embedding generation  Milvus storage. Validate each step with assertions on NATS messages, vector data integrity, and processing completion.

subtasks.description: Create integration tests for complete question-answer workflow with real-time delivery
subtasks.details: Test full Q&A pipeline: question submission  vector similarity search  RAG generation  real-time answer delivery. Validate context retrieval accuracy, answer quality, and response timing.

subtasks.details: Test WebSocket connection lifecycle, session-based message routing to answers.{session_id} topics, heartbeat functionality, connection pooling, and graceful disconnection handling with multiple concurrent sessions.

subtasks.details: Test service-to-service communication, NATS message flow coordination, error propagation between services, service restart resilience, and end-to-end system health under various failure scenarios.

tasks.title: Test and validate complete RAG pipeline integration
tasks.description: Perform end-to-end testing and validation of the complete RAG system
tasks.details: Conduct comprehensive system testing including: document ingestion from Brazilian clinical protocols, vector search performance validation, Q&A accuracy testing, real-time WebSocket functionality, dashboard monitoring, and load testing. Validate all TTL-based cleanup mechanisms and ephemeral data handling.
tasks.testStrategy: Full system validation with real clinical protocol documents and comprehensive performance benchmarks

subtasks.title: Set up comprehensive testing environment and infrastructure
subtasks.description: Configure testing infrastructure with all services running and monitoring tools enabled
subtasks.details: Set up complete testing environment with Docker Compose, ensure all services (Milvus, NATS, MinIO, etcd) are running, configure monitoring dashboards, and establish baseline performance metrics. Prepare test data sets of Brazilian clinical protocols for validation.

subtasks.title: Test document ingestion pipeline with real clinical protocols
subtasks.description: Validate complete document processing workflow from URL to vector storage
subtasks.details: Test document download, PDF parsing, text chunking, and embedding generation using real Brazilian clinical protocol documents. Verify proper metadata extraction, chunk overlap handling, and successful vector insertion into Milvus collections.

subtasks.title: Validate vector search performance and accuracy
subtasks.description: Test Milvus vector search operations for speed and relevance
subtasks.details: Perform vector similarity search tests with various query types and complexity levels. Measure search latency (target <100ms), validate top-K retrieval accuracy, test different similarity thresholds, and verify proper metadata filtering functionality.

subtasks.title: Test Q&A accuracy and RAG pipeline effectiveness
subtasks.description: Validate end-to-end question-answering accuracy using medical queries
subtasks.details: Test RAG pipeline with diverse medical questions, validate answer quality and relevance, verify proper source attribution, test context window handling, and measure response generation times. Include edge cases and domain-specific terminology validation.

subtasks.title: Test real-time WebSocket functionality and session management
subtasks.description: Validate WebSocket connections, session routing, and real-time answer delivery
subtasks.details: Test WebSocket connection establishment, session-based answer routing to correct topics (answers.{session_id}), real-time message delivery, connection persistence, and proper session timeout handling. Validate multiple concurrent session support.

subtasks.title: Perform load testing and concurrency validation
subtasks.description: Test system performance under concurrent load and stress conditions
subtasks.details: Execute load tests with multiple concurrent document processing jobs, simultaneous Q&A sessions, and high-volume message throughput. Test worker concurrency limits, NATS message handling under load, and Milvus performance with large datasets. Monitor resource utilization and identify bottlenecks.

subtasks.title: Validate TTL-based cleanup and ephemeral data handling
subtasks.description: Test automatic message expiration, session cleanup, and data persistence patterns
subtasks.details: Verify TTL-based message expiration in NATS (1-hour default), test session automatic cleanup, validate that only vector embeddings persist in Milvus while processing data expires correctly. Test system recovery after TTL cleanup and ensure no data leakage or accumulation.
